price: Anaasε wͻnhunuu sε Nyankopͻn ma akyɛdeɛ no bu obi a Ɔpε so, εna obi nso Osusu de ma no? Nokorε sε nsεnkyerεnee wͻ woi mu de ma amanfoͻ a wͻgye die.
arabic: أَوَلَمۡ يَرَوۡاْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَبۡسُطُ ٱلرِّزۡقَ لِمَن يَشَآءُ وَيَقۡدِرُۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَٰتٖ لِّقَوۡمٖ يُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: awalam yaraw anna al-laha yabsuṭu al-riz'qa liman yashāu wayaqdiru inna fī dhālika laāyātin liqawmin yu'minūna
